entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:17 PM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:17 PM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:17 PM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
